channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Agent

item.title: CVE-2022-45452|2024-08-03T14:17:00.924Z -- acronis -- acronis%20agent
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to insecure folder permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Windows) before build 30430, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows) before build 30984.

item.title: CVE-2022-45458|2024-08-03T14:17:03.554Z -- acronis -- acronis%20agent
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure and manipulation due to improper certification validation. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Windows, macOS, Linux) before build 29633, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows, macOS, Linux) before build 30984.

item.description: Sensitive information disclosure and manipulation due to improper certification validation. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Windows) before build 29633, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows) before build 30984.
